import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { getDetail } from '../redux/actions'; import loading from '../assets/cargando.gif' import style from '../css/Detail.module.css' import EvolutionChain from './EvolutionChain'; export default function Detail(props) { const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(getDetail(props.match.params.id)); }, [dispatch]) const P = useSelector(state => state.detail) // P = current pokemon return (
{ P.length && P[0].id == props.match.params.id ?

{P[0].id} - {P[0].name.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + P[0].name.slice(1)}

Types: {P[0].types ? P[0].types.map(el => { return (el) } ) : Types not found }
{!P[0].createdInDb ?
Description: {P[0].description}

Combat

Abilities: {P[0].abilities.length ? P[0].abilities.map(el => { return ( {el.replace('-', ' ')} ) }) : This pokemon has no abilities }
Moves: {P[0].moves.length ? P[0].moves.map(el => { return ( {el.replace('-', ' ')} ) }) : This pokemon has no moves }

Breeding

Specie: {P[0].species ? {P[0].species} : This pokemon has no specie }
Habitat: {P[0].habitat ? {P[0].habitat} : This pokemon has no habitat }
Growth Rate: {P[0].growth ? {P[0].growth} : This pokemon has no growth-rate }
Area Encounters: {P[0].locations.length ? P[0].locations.map(el => { return ( {el} ) }) : This pokemon has no encounter locations }

:
}
Hp: {P[0].hp}
Attack: {P[0].attack}
Defense: {P[0].defense}
Speed: {P[0].speed}
Weight: {P[0].weight / 10}kg
{P[0].height / 10}m
Height
{ !P[0].createdInDb ?
{P[0].happiness}
Happiness
{P[0].capture}
Capture Rate
:
}
{ !P[0].createdInDb ?
{ P[0].evolution && P[0].evolution.length > 1 ?
{ P[0].evolution[2] ? :
}
:
This pokemon has no evolutions
}
:
}
:

Loading...

}
) }
